name: United States
admission_notes: US universities follow holistic evaluation: CGPA + English test + GRE/GMAT + SOP + LORs + Resume + Projects + Internships. Strong project portfolio and 2-3 LORs are required for competitive admits.

visa_rules.post_study_work_options: F-1 OPT (12 months) + STEM OPT (24 months extension) for eligible STEM programs.
visa_rules.financial_proof_note: Minimum 1-year tuition + 1-year living must be shown during I-20 processing.

reasons_to_choose: Top technology and STEM education globally.
High chances of internships and part-time jobs in major cities.
Massive Indian student community and strong alumni network.
Excellent research opportunities and industry connections.
country_cautions: High cost of living in large cities like New York, Boston, Seattle.
Competitive job market requires strong skills and networking.
recommended_exams: GRE (recommended for CS/DS, required for ambitious unis)

universities.name: University of Texas at Arlington
city_notes: Located in the Dallasâ€“Fort Worth tech hub.
Affordable compared to other major US cities.
Large Indian community and groceries available.
highlights: Very popular for MS CS and MS DS.
Strong industry connections for internships.
Affordable tuition compared to many US universities.
cautions: Competition is high for TA/RA positions.
Workload can be heavy in core technical courses.

courses.name: MS Computer Science
course_highlights: Strong curriculum with flexible electives.
Located near major tech companies for internships.
course_cautions: GRE expected to be strong (305+ safer).
Must have strong coding background.
recommended_for: Students aiming for Software, ML, AI engineering roles.
Strong programmers with good CGPA.

courses.name: MS Data Science
course_highlights: STEM designatedâ€”eligible for 3-year OPT.
Balanced curriculum across ML, statistics, and big data tools.
course_cautions: Admission selectiveâ€”needs strong profile.
Programming + maths heavy.
recommended_for: Students targeting Data Scientist / MLE roles.
8+ CGPA + good projects recommended.

city_notes: Phoenix area is a major tech & semiconductor hub.

highlights: Top-ranked public university.

cautions: Competitive admissions.

course_highlights: Strong AI, ML, and Cyber specialization.
course_cautions: Highly competitive.

Excellent placement outcomes.
cautions: Very expensive tuition + living.

course_highlights: Best Co-op program in the world.

course_cautions: High tuition.
Very selective.

courses.name: MS Computer Science

Excellent professor network for internships.
course_cautions: Competition is high.
Some subjects are math-heavy.

universities.name: University of Illinois at Chicago
city_notes: Major finance + consulting + data hub.
High cost of living.
Great for analytics jobs.
highlights: Excellent for analytics, finance & operations.
Strong brand in the Midwest.
cautions: Housing expensive.
Weather very cold.

courses.name: MS Business Analytics
course_highlights: Excellent placement for BI & analytics roles.
One of the best affordable analytics programs in Chicago.
course_cautions: More business-oriented, less coding-focused.
Fast-paced curriculum.

universities.name: Arizona State University
city_notes: Huge student population.
Warm climate almost year-round.
Strong tech presence in Phoenix metro area.
highlights: Very strong national reputation.
Huge Indian student network.
cautions: Weather extremely hot.
On-campus competition for jobs.

courses.name: MS Information Systems Management
course_highlights: Excellent mix of tech + business.
Strong ROI for MIS roles.
course_cautions: Very fast-paced program.
Expensive for living if you choose prime areas.

universities.name: University of South Florida
city_notes: Warm climate, beach city.
Growing IT + analytics job market.
Good Indian community.
highlights: Affordable for a public research university.
Great for analytics beginners.
cautions: Not a hardcore CS university.
Too many Indian applicants every year.

courses.name: MS Business Analytics & Information Systems
course_highlights: Great ROI.
Easy city for part-time jobs.
Flexible curriculum.
course_cautions: Not for students seeking hardcore engineering roles.
Need good communication skills for BA jobs.

universities.name: University of Texas at Dallas
city_notes: Huge Indian population.
One of the biggest tech job hubs.
Very student-friendly city.
highlights: Top choice for MIS / ITM among Indians.
Amazing job market nearby.
cautions: Extremely competitive.
Many Indian students â†’ harder for on-campus jobs.

courses.name: MS Information Technology & Management
course_highlights: Extremely good ROI.
Top placements in Dallas tech sector.
course_cautions: Heavy competition from Indian students.
Need strong profile to stand out.

universities.name: University of Pittsburgh
city_notes: Known as the Robotics & Healthcare tech hub.
Great internship opportunities with local tech & healthcare companies.
highlights: Strong research reputation.
Excellent for Information Science + HCI.
cautions: Competitive admissions.
Living slightly expensive near university area.

courses.name: MS Information Science
course_highlights: Great curriculum for big data + AI.
High employment rate.
course_cautions: GRE may be advantageous.
Fast coursework pace.

universities.name: University of Minnesota
city_notes: Very cold winters.
Strong big data, engineering and medical tech industries.
highlights: Top-ranked CS department.
Great research and PhD pathways.
cautions: Extremely competitive.
High academic workload.

courses.name: MS Computer Science
course_highlights: Top 100 global ranking.
Excellent placements.
course_cautions: Needs strong coding background.
Weather can be harsh.

universities.name: SUNY Buffalo
city_notes: Affordable city.
Lots of Indian community + easy groceries.
highlights: Strong STEM programs.
Affordable compared to major cities.
cautions: Weather is extremely cold.
Competition high for DS & CS.

courses.name: MS Data Science
course_highlights: Affordable public university.
Good DS curriculum.
course_cautions: Frozen winters.
Classes fill up fast.

universities.name: Clemson University
city_notes: Small city, peaceful environment.
Affordable cost of living.
highlights: Strong engineering faculty.
High student satisfaction.
cautions: Fewer city internships.
Not suitable for those wanting big-city nightlife.

courses.name: MS Computer Engineering
course_highlights: Strong embedded systems + VLSI.
Affordable cost.
course_cautions: City is small.
Research heavy â†’ workload high.

universities.name: Syracuse University
city_notes: Very cold winters.
Safe and student-friendly city.
highlights: Top program for Applied Data Science.
Flexible online + on-campus options.
cautions: Tuition slightly high.
Weather very harsh.

courses.name: MS Applied Data Science
course_highlights: Very industry-focused.
Big data + cloud mix.
course_cautions: DS competition is high.
Scholarships limited.

universities.name: University of California, Riverside
city_notes: Affordable alternative to LA.
Warm climate and big city access.
highlights: UC brand value.
Good for ML + Systems.
cautions: High tuition.
Competitive for CS.

courses.name: MS Computer Science
course_highlights: UC brand + strong faculty.
Close to LA tech market.
course_cautions: Expensive.
Need strong coding background.

universities.name: Illinois Institute of Technology
city_notes: Strong job market for MIS/Data.
High cost of living.
highlights: Tech-focused curriculum.
Great for ITM placements.
cautions: Expensive city.
High Indian competition.

courses.name: MS Information Technology & Management
course_highlights: Great ROI for MIS roles.
Flexible curriculum.
course_cautions: Chicago expensive.
Some courses outdated.

universities.name: Northeastern University â€“ Seattle
city_notes: Amazon + Microsoft city.
Extreme internship opportunities.
highlights: Top-ranked co-op program.
Great for DS/Analytics jobs.
cautions: Very expensive.
Heavy Indian competition.

courses.name: MS Analytics
course_highlights: Co-op = guaranteed work experience.
Best location for analytics.
course_cautions: Very expensive overall.
Admissions fast fill-up.

universities.name: UMBC
city_notes: Close to Washington DC job market.
Affordable option.
highlights: Strong cybersecurity reputation.
Affordable tuition fees.
cautions: Not a top brand.
Limited DS electives.

courses.name: MS Data Science
course_highlights: Very budget-friendly.
DS + Cyber combination possible.
course_cautions: Limited research.
Need strong personal projects.

universities.name: Santa Clara University
city_notes: Located inside Silicon Valley.
Tons of FAANG internship opportunities.
highlights: Premium location advantage.
Great networking opportunities.
cautions: Very expensive.
Admission competitive.

courses.name: MS Computer Science
course_highlights: Silicon Valley location = huge career boost.
Strong CS core subjects.
course_cautions: Very high cost.
Requires strong coding background.
